texto: 7.9.4 Examples of applications Large-scale projects (such as the space programme) routinely use the Monte Carlo method. Applications are not limited to any specific type of industry. Typical areas of applications include statistical tolerance, process evaluation, system optimization, reliability theory and prediction.
